cards.html:
Mario has had countless battles against Bowser, but have they ever duked it out in Hyrule? Well, a new Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild mod allows you to do just that!

Here’s are some videos for you to check out…

Credits go out to LynardKiller for the Bowser mod, WilianZilz for the Mario mod and BeardBear for the music mod!

 

What do you think about this mod? Let us know in the comment section below.

Be sure to like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter @switchaboo for more on Nintendo Switch. And hey, why not check out Konami’s plans for Switch games at E3?
